org.cojen.util

Class WeakIdentityCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cojen.util.RefCache<K,V>
      • org.cojen.util.WeakKeyCache<K,V>
        • org.cojen.util.WeakIdentityCache<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache<K,V>

    public class WeakIdentityCache<K,V>
extends WeakKeyCache<K,V>
    Simple thread-safe cache which evicts entries via a shared background thread. Cache permits null values, but not null keys. Keys are compared for equality via identity comparison instead of using the key's built-in hashcode and equals methods.
    Author:
    Brian S O'Neill
    See Also:
    WeakKeyCache
